feature.label: SWI-Prolog Feature
feature.description: The SADL Prlog Plug-in is a Prolog-based reasoner for the Semantic Application Design Language (SADL), which is a controlled English grammar and Eclipse IDE for building, testing, and deploying semantic models.
feature.license:
The SADL Prolog Plug-in is available under the Eclipse Public License.
The plug-in requires that SWI-Prolog be downloaded and installed separately.
